alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, south central Craven, east central Onslow and southwestern Carteret Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Peletier, or 11 miles west of Newport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Stella, Swansboro, Cape Carteret, Broad Creek, Kuhns, Peletier, Bogue, Hammocks Beach, Bogue Inlet Pier, Hammocks Beach State Park, Cedar Point and Indian Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
